definition[0]: to bend your body forward and down
example[0]: We had to stoop to pass through the low entrance.
example[1]: Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
definition[1]: to stand with your back and shoulders bent forwards
definition[2]: if you have a stoop, your shoulders are bent forward
example[2]: Mr Hamilton was an odd, quiet man who walked with a stoop.
definition[3]: a raised area at the door of a house, usually big enough to sit on
